control_attributes.Control: MP-6 (1) REVIEW / APPROVE / TRACK / DOCUMENT / VERIFY
control_attributes.control_description: The organization reviews, approves, tracks, documents, and verifies media sanitization and disposal actions.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization prohibits the use of sanitization-resistant media in organizational information systems.
